meaningMnemonic: What you <radical>say</radical> to the <radical>director</radical> is judged immediately. You're having trouble understanding this <kanji>part of speech</kanji>, so he's trying to help you. But you say it over and over and he keeps saying you're wrong.
readingMnemonic: The director asks you again, "What is the part of speech for the word <reading>shee</reading>p (し)?"
